content: fritz is the first of nine different fugly monsters that i have created they are inspired by my love of the fugglers funny ugly monsters worsted weight yarn works the best but you can just change your hook for the yarn size colors are your choice and he really has no limits in that area adding extras like flowers hats etc makes him more unique basic knowledge of crochet stitches and abbreviations is necessary you will need one main color for the head/body limbs ears and tail a contrasting color or two for the belly patch and inner mouth and a thinner white yarn for the teeth 5mm hook for everything except the teeth which uses a 3 5mm hook stitch marker scissors and a yarn needle safety eyes and nose or you can stitch or crochet them pattern is untested i double checked for errors but please feel free to message me with any questions
